title: What's Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pizza place/cafe/bar serves traditional napoli style pizza, American squares, sweets and salads. Vegan dough and vegan mozzarella are available. Mon-Thur vegetarian and vegan only. Meat only available on weekends.
